wikipedia_page.main: Richard Holmes (born 7 November 1980) is a former footballer who played in The Football League for Notts County. He also had a loan spell at Hereford United in the Conference National. Holmes grew up in Bottesford, Leicestershire.

response: * Richard Holmes (organist) (1931–1991), American jazz organist known as Richard "Groove" Holmes
* Richard Holmes (Canadian football) (born 1952), former Canadian Football League running back
* Richard Holmes (footballer) (born 1980), former footballer for Notts County
* Richard Holmes (Connecticut settler) (1633–1704), founding settler of Norwalk, Connecticut
* Richard Holmes (military historian) (1946–2011), British soldier and military historian
